GeoConvert.cpp

00001 /**
00002  * \file GeoConvert.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for geographic coordinate conversions
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2008, 2009, 2010, 2011) <charles@karney.com>
00006  * and licensed under the LGPL.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile with -I../include and link with GeoCoords.o MGRS.o UTMUPS.o DMS.o
00010  * TransverseMercator.o PolarStereographic.o
00011  *
00012  * See the <a href="GeoConvert.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00013  * information.
00014  **********************************************************************/
00015 
00016 #include <iostream>
00017 #include <sstream>
00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <sstream>
00020 #include <fstream>
00021 #include <GeographicLib/GeoCoords.hpp>
00022 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00023 
00024 #include "GeoConvert.usage"
00025 
00026 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00027   try {
00028     using namespace GeographicLib;
00029     typedef Math::real real;
00030     enum { GEOGRAPHIC, DMS, UTMUPS, MGRS, CONVERGENCE };
00031     int outputmode = GEOGRAPHIC;
00032     int prec = 0;
00033     int zone = UTMUPS::MATCH;
00034     bool centerp = true;
00035     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00036 
00037     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00038       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00039       if (arg == "-g")
00040         outputmode = GEOGRAPHIC;
00041       else if (arg == "-d")
00042         outputmode = DMS;
00043       else if (arg == "-u")
00044         outputmode = UTMUPS;
00045       else if (arg == "-m")
00046         outputmode = MGRS;
00047       else if (arg == "-c")
00048         outputmode = CONVERGENCE;
00049       else if (arg == "-n")
00050         centerp = false;
00051       else if (arg == "-p") {
00052         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00053         std::istringstream str(argv[m]);
00054         char c;
00055         if (!(str >> prec) || (str >> c)) {
00056           std::cerr << "Precision " << argv[m] << " is not a number\n";
00057           return 1;
00058         }
00059       } else if (arg == "-z") {
00060         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00061         std::string zonestr(argv[m]);
00062         try {
00063           bool northp;
00064           UTMUPS::DecodeZone(zonestr, zone, northp);
00065         }
00066         catch (const std::exception&) {
00067           std::istringstream str(zonestr);
00068           char c;
00069           if (!(str >> zone) || (str >> c)) {
00070             std::cerr << "Zone " << zonestr
00071                       << " is not a number or zone+hemisphere\n";
00072             return 1;
00073           }
00074           if (!(zone >= UTMUPS::MINZONE && zone <= UTMUPS::MAXZONE)) {
00075             std::cerr << "Zone " << zone << " not in [0, 60]\n";
00076             return 1;
00077           }
00078         }
00079       } else if (arg == "-s")
00080         zone = UTMUPS::STANDARD;
00081       else if (arg == "-t")
00082         zone = UTMUPS::UTM;
00083       else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00084         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00085         istring = argv[m];
00086       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00087         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00088         ifile = argv[m];
00089       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00090         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00091         ofile = argv[m];
00092       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00093         std::cout
00094           << argv[0]
00095           << ": $Id: a1a3586bb30ff0d72f7f306d33defc01c359f80b $\n"
00096           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00097         return 0;
00098       } else
00099         return usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00100     }
00101 
00102     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00103       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00104       return 1;
00105     }
00106     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00107     std::ifstream infile;
00108     std::istringstream instring;
00109     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00110       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00111       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00112         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00113         return 1;
00114       }
00115     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00116       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00117       while (true) {
00118         m = istring.find(';', m);
00119         if (m == std::string::npos)
00120           break;
00121         istring[m] = '\n';
00122       }
00123       instring.str(istring);
00124     }
00125     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00126       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00127 
00128     std::ofstream outfile;
00129     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00130     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00131       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00132       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00133         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for wrting\n";
00134         return 1;
00135       }
00136     }
00137     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00138 
00139     GeoCoords p;
00140     std::string s;
00141     std::string os;
00142     int retval = 0;
00143 
00144     while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00145       try {
00146         p.Reset(s, centerp);
00147         p.SetAltZone(zone);
00148         switch (outputmode) {
00149         case GEOGRAPHIC:
00150           os = p.GeoRepresentation(prec);
00151           break;
00152         case DMS:
00153           os = p.DMSRepresentation(prec);
00154           break;
00155         case UTMUPS:
00156           os = p.AltUTMUPSRepresentation(prec);
00157           break;
00158         case MGRS:
00159           os = p.AltMGRSRepresentation(prec);
00160           break;
00161         case CONVERGENCE:
00162           {
00163             real
00164               gamma = p.AltConvergence(),
00165               k = p.AltScale();
00166             os =
00167               DMS::Encode(gamma, std::max(-5,std::min(8,prec))+5, DMS::NUMBER)
00168               + " " +
00169               DMS::Encode(k, std::max(-5,std::min(8,prec))+7, DMS::NUMBER);
00170           }
00171         }
00172       }
00173       catch (const std::exception& e) {
00174         // Write error message to cout so output lines match input lines
00175         os = std::string("ERROR: ") + e.what();
00176         retval = 1;
00177       }
00178       *output << os << "\n";
00179     }
00180     return retval;
00181   }
00182   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00183     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00184     return 1;
00185   }
00186   catch (...) {
00187     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00188     return 1;
00189   }
00190 }
